item.title: MICROCHIP TECHNOLOGY INC 10-K
item.description: MICROCHIP TECHNOLOGY INC, which is in the Semiconductors & Related Devices [3674] industry, SEC 10-K filing on May 20, 2022 had 36255 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
